mapper.update: UPDATE SCHOOL SET #{SCHOOL_NAME}, SCHOOL_MAJOR = #{SCHOOL_MAJOR}, SCHOOL_DEGREE = #{SCHOOL_DEGREE}, SCHOOL_OF_START = #{SCHOOL_OF_START}, SCHOOL_OF_END = #{SCHOOL_OF_END}, SCHOOL_CREDIT = #{SCHOOL_CREDIT}, SCHOOL_MAXCREDIT = #{#{SCHOOL_MAXCREDIT}, SCHOOL_EXPLANATION = #{SCHOOL_EXPLANATION} WHERE SCHOOL_SEQ = #{SCHOOL_SEQ} AND SCHOOL_MEMBER_CODE = #{SCHOOL_MEMBER_CODE}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SCHOOL WHERE SCHOOL_SEQ = #{SCHOOL_SEQ} AND SCHOOL_MEMBER_CODE = #{SCHOOL_MEMBER_CODE}
